trans-unit.source: App key. You find it after creating a Dropbox App on: https://www.dropbox.com/developers
App secret You find it after creating a Dropbox App on: https://www.dropbox.com/developers
Click on the link below and login to Dropbox. Grand access to the app and copy the AuthCode into this field
After inserting the AuthCode you have to save this record and open it again. Below you will find an access_token. Copy it into this field.
After inserting the AuthCode you have to save this record and open it again. Below you will find an userId. Copy it into this field.
Connect TYPO3 with your Dropbox / Dropbox status
